titles.title: A bill to amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to permit the planting of chicory on base acres.
A bill to amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to permit the planting of chicory on base acres.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Amends the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to permit the planting of chicory on base acres for purposes of direct and counter-cyclical payments.
